YOUR NEW GUILTY PLEASURE

If you thought you screamed before for ice cream, you haven't heard anything yet. The new housemade ice cream program at DA CRUST's Gold Coast location is really something to shout about, taking into consideration how divine the texture is, how pronounced the flavors are, and how adorable the adjoining cookies are. Just in time for warm weather, DA CRUST comes to the rescue with sensational, scream-worthy ice cream that I literally want to fill a big bowl with and eat for dinner.
